(I noticed your lovely new subject after a two day leave.  How lovely!  I don't know if you've been told how stupid that was by Yanshosh or anyone, but if you haven't, I'll tell you.

Putting something like that inside an e-mail is ok.  OOC or IC.  But on a subject, that doesn't fly.  IF you do that again, you will be penalized heavily)
